definition: to regret not having met earlier (idiom); It is nice to meet you finally./It feels like we have known each other all along.
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview

sentences.english: Or for love in the heart can not calm the Brief Encounter and settle old scores?
sentences.chinese: 還是爲愛在心裏不能坦然的相見恨晚而心有不甘？

sentences.english: The lovers meet, but meet too late.
sentences.chinese: 有情人邂逅卻相見恨晚。

sentences.english: Brief Encounter, smart interpretation of the number of segments pity love.
sentences.chinese: 一首相見恨晚，詮釋叻多少段可惜的愛情。

sentences.english: You say that we met earlier, I said you are not brave enough for love.
sentences.chinese: 你說是我們相見恨晚，我說爲愛你不夠勇敢。

definition: hard to explain in a few words (idiom); complicated and not easy to express succinctly
lit. don't fight, won't make friends (idiom); an exchange of blows may lead to friendship/no discord, no concord
to be kindred spirits/to hit it off
to be at a loss for words/speechless
